## Top 5 sites and their best friends!

```{r top5_bffs_table, echo=FALSE}

site_names <- p1_field_visit_sites_sf %>% 
  st_drop_geometry() %>% 
  select(site_no, station_nm)

p2_field_visit_site_bff %>% 
  filter(site_no %in% p2_field_visit_sites_top5) %>% 
  left_join(site_names, by = "site_no") %>% 
  select(site_no, station_nm, best_friend) %>% 
  gridExtra::tableGrob(rows=NULL) %>% 
  gridExtra::grid.arrange()

```
